name.japanese: シャクヤクのぼったくりBAR

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Reveals His Past
keyEvents.description: Rayleigh reveals his identity as Roger's first mate and shares the true history of the Pirate King with the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: This location serves as the setting for one of the most important revelatory conversations in the series.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Question About the Void Century
keyEvents.description: Robin asks Rayleigh about the Void Century and the Roger Pirates' knowledge of it.
keyEvents.significance: The bar becomes the site where the complete truth about the Void Century is confirmed to exist.

description: A bar in Grove 13 of Sabaody Archipelago owned and operated by Shakuyaku (Shakky). Despite its name, it's a safe haven where Rayleigh can often be found.
geography: Located in Grove 13 of Sabaody Archipelago

keyEvents.title: Kizaru's Arrival
keyEvents.description: Admiral Kizaru arrives at Grove 27 by riding atop a cannonball, creating panic among the pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Kizaru's arrival escalates the crisis on Sabaody and sets up the climactic confrontation of the arc.

description: An archipelago of 79 numbered groves near the Red Line, serving as the final stop before the New World. Each grove is a giant Yarukiman Mangrove tree whose roots serve as islands.
geography: Located in Paradise near the Red Line and Fishman Island entrance
climate: Temperate with unique soap bubble phenomena from the Yarukiman Mangroves

keyEvents.title: Kizaru's Landing Point
keyEvents.description: Admiral Kizaru lands in Grove 27 aboard a cannonball, beginning his assault on the pirates of Sabaody.
keyEvents.significance: This grove becomes the entry point for the Marines' intervention in the Sabaody crisis.

description: One of the 79 groves of Sabaody Archipelago, where Admiral Kizaru makes his dramatic entrance during the Sabaody incident.
geography: Part of Sabaody Archipelago's grove system

keyEvents.title: Roger Recruits Crocus
keyEvents.description: Flashback reveals that the Roger Pirates encountered Crocus at Twin Capes and recruited him as their ship's doctor.
keyEvents.significance: Explains Crocus's connection to the Pirate King and his presence at the Grand Line's entrance.

description: The entry point to the Grand Line from Reverse Mountain, where the lighthouse keeper Crocus resides inside the whale Laboon.
geography: Located at the exit of Reverse Mountain where it meets the Grand Line
